name: Functional
Description: This activity involves movements that enable greater overall body functioning and improve performance through better coordination and muscle stimulation..

name: Box
Description: Basic training that consists of throwing soft punches into the air with fluid movements.

name: Fitness
Description: Training rutine in which specific exercises are applied according to the desired body area to tone.

name: Crossfit
Description: Works on strength and endurance, developing all muscle groups.

name: Yoga
Description: Helps improving your body and mental health

name: Spinning
Description: Aerobic and cardiovascular exercise performed on a stationary bicycle to tone legs and improve endurance.

name: Pilates
Description: Relax your mind and improve your articular movement.

name: LAB
Description: Exercises to tone legs, abs and glutes.

name: Zumba
Description: Effective, easy and fun training, designed for everyone, combining music and dance moves.

name: Crossfit
Description: Works on strength and endurance, developing all muscle groups.

name: Kangoo Power
Description: Aerobic activity producing less impact than running, working on balance and coordination.
